brief_title: Effects of ONO-2506PO in Patients With Alzheimer's Disease
brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to establish the presence of an effect of treatment with ONO-2506PO in patients with Alzheimer's Disease, based upon cognitive and global scales.
criteria: Inclusion Criteria: - Diagnosis of probable Alzheimer's Disease using NINCDS/ADRDA criteria - Standardized MMSE Score of 13 to 24 points (inclusive) - Modified Hachinski score equal or less than 4 Exclusion Criteria: - Serious systemic disease that may preclude survival to study completion - Other illnesses that may include dementive features
